idDoc.type: Document type ('CÉDULA DE CIUDADANÍA', 'CÉDULA DE EXTRANJERÍA', 'NÚMERO DE IDENTIFICACIÓN DE EXTRANJERO', 'PASAPORTE', 'REGISTRO CIVIL' or 'TARJETA DE IDENTIDAD')

debtor.roadNumber: Road number (optional, but mandatory if roadType, roadName, roadDetail or roadStratum is present.)
debtor.roadSubNumber: Road sub number (optional, but mandatory if roadType, roadName, roadDetail or roadStratum is present.)
telephones: optional array of telephone numbers up to 3
cellphones: optional array of cellphone numbers up to 3
debtor.emailsOrReason: An array of 1-3 emails or a string containing a single reason for no email
webPages: optional array of web pages up to 3
debtor.hasMultipleDebtCollectionProcedures: boolean (¿En contra de usted se han iniciado dos (2) o más procedimientos públicos o privados de cobro de obligaciones dinerarias, de ejecución especial o de restitución de bienes por mora en el pago de cánones?)
debtor.employmentOrIncomeCertificationFilePath: Path to employment or income certification file
debtor.totalMonthlyIncomeFromOtherActivities: Total monthly income from other activities in COP
debtor.totalMonthlyIncomeFromOtherActivitiesDes: Description of total monthly income from other activities

idDoc.type: Document type ('CÉDULA DE CIUDADANÍA', 'CÉDULA DE EXTRANJERÍA', 'NÚMERO DE IDENTIFICACIÓN DE EXTRANJERO', 'PASAPORTE', 'REGISTRO CIVIL' or 'TARJETA DE IDENTIDAD')

maritalOrPatrimonialPartnership.firstName: First name (Spouse is optional. If set, publicDeedOrJudgmentFilePath and assetsListFilePath will be ignore.)

maritalOrPatrimonialPartnership.publicDeedOrJudgmentFilePath: Path to public deed or judgment file if has Partnership Dissolved Within Last Two Years (optional)
maritalOrPatrimonialPartnership.assetsListFilePath: Path to assets list file if has Partnership Dissolved Within Last Two Years (optional)

debtor.schoolLevel: School level (optional: 'DOCTORADO O EQUIVALENTE', 'EDUCACIÓN BÁSICA PRIMARIA', 'EDUCACIÓN BÁSICA SECUNDARIA O SECUNDARIA BAJA', 'EDUCACIÓN DE LA PRIMERA INFANCIA', 'EDUCACIÓN MEDIA O SECUNDARIA ALTA', 'EDUCACIÓN POSTSECUNDARIA NO SUPERIOR', 'EDUCACIÓN TÉCNICA PROFESIONAL Y TECNOLÓGICA', 'ESPECIALIZACIÓN, MAESTRÍA O EQUIVALENTE', 'NINGUNA', 'NO INFORMA', 'UNIVERSITARIO O EQUIVALENTE')

professions.name: Profession name (There is a lot of known fixed options like 'ABARROTERO', 'ABOGADO', etc)
professions.institution: Optional: Institution (There is a lot of known fixed options like 'CENTRO DE EDUCACION MILITAR - CEMIL', 'CENTRO EDUCACIONAL DE COMPUTOS Y SISTEMAS-CEDESISTEMAS-', etc.)
professions.professionalCardNumber: Optional: Professional card number (A nonnegative integer)
professions.degreeIssuingEntity: Optional: Degree issuing entity (A nonempty string)

creditors: An array containing at least two creditors, each with at least one credit. Additionally, at least two distinct creditors must each have at least one credit exceeding 90 days past due (daysPastDue)..
Creditors can be natural persons or legal entities.

idDoc.type: Document type ('CÉDULA DE CIUDADANÍA', 'CÉDULA DE EXTRANJERÍA', 'NÚMERO DE IDENTIFICACIÓN DE EXTRANJERO', 'PASAPORTE', 'REGISTRO CIVIL' or 'TARJETA DE IDENTIDAD')
idDoc.issueCity: TODO: Optional (and just appears if type is 'CÉDULA DE CIUDADANÍA'): City where document was issued

identificationData.filePath: TODO: Optional: Path to document file

addressOrReason: Optional field: address object or reason for no address

addressOrReason.roadNumber: Road number (optional, but mandatory if roadType, roadName, roadDetail or roadStratum is present.)
addressOrReason.roadSubNumber: Road sub number (optional, but mandatory if roadType, roadName, roadDetail or roadStratum is present.)

contactInformation.emailsOrReason: An array of 1-3 emails or a string containing a single reason for no email

creditors.schoolLevel: School level (optional: 'DOCTORADO O EQUIVALENTE', 'EDUCACIÓN BÁSICA PRIMARIA', 'EDUCACIÓN BÁSICA SECUNDARIA O SECUNDARIA BAJA', 'EDUCACIÓN DE LA PRIMERA INFANCIA', 'EDUCACIÓN MEDIA O SECUNDARIA ALTA', 'EDUCACIÓN POSTSECUNDARIA NO SUPERIOR', 'EDUCACIÓN TÉCNICA PROFESIONAL Y TECNOLÓGICA', 'ESPECIALIZACIÓN, MAESTRÍA O EQUIVALENTE', 'NINGUNA', 'NO INFORMA', 'UNIVERSITARIO O EQUIVALENTE')

professions.name: Profession name (There is a lot of known fixed options like 'ABARROTERO', 'ABOGADO', etc)
professions.institution: Optional: Institution (There is a lot of known fixed options like 'CENTRO DE EDUCACION MILITAR - CEMIL', 'CENTRO EDUCACIONAL DE COMPUTOS Y SISTEMAS-CEDESISTEMAS-', etc.)
professions.professionalCardNumber: Optional: Professional card number (A nonnegative integer)
professions.degreeIssuingEntity: Optional: Degree issuing entity (A nonempty string)

creditors.extraData: TODO: Optional extra data: Debtor relationship and Debtor relationship description

credits.creditExpirationDateOrDaysPastDue: Optional: ISO date (yyyy-mm-dd) or a nonnegative integer

identificationData.nit: Optional: Nit Number (At least length 2, only digits and can start with + or -)
identificationData.name: Company name

contactInformation.judicialNotificationAddress: Optional: Judicial notification address as a string
contactInformation.unknownJudicialNotificationAddressReason: Optional: Reason for no Judicial notification address as a string. If the address is provided, this field must be not provided.
telephones: optional array of telephone numbers up to 3
cellphones: optional array of cellphone numbers up to 3
contactInformation.emailsOrReason: Optional: An array up to 3 emails or a string containing a single reason for no email
webPages: optional array of web pages up to 3

credits.creditExpirationDateOrDaysPastDue: Optional: ISO date (yyyy-mm-dd) or a nonnegative integer
